title: Weekend Break at Hilton Mumbai
description: Only five minutes from Mumbai International Airport, you’ll step into a Hilton-style world of traditional charm adorned with contemporary design. Enjoy a weekend of glamourous luxury in India’s largest and most exciting city, and wake each day to a delicious buffet breakfast plus enjoy one buffet dinner for two during your stay.
offer_address: Sahar Airport Rd, Ashok Nagar, Andheri East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400099, India

title: Oberoi Opulence: Mumbai & Udaipur
description: Embark on a once-in-a-lifetime Oberoi Hotels exclusive journey through India and experience the country's most opulent Oberoi accommodation. Experience beyond five-star palatial luxury, staying at The Oberoi Mumbai and The Oberoi Udaivilas in Udaipur - the world’s number one hotel. Enjoy daily breakfast, evening cocktails, two three-course lunches, a boat ride on Lake Pichola, private return airport transfers, daily yoga sessions, personalised butler service, spa discounts, Wi-Fi and more.

title: Serene Thane Oasis Just an Hour from Mumbai with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Drinks
description:
Spread across 16 acres of lush greenery, Saya Grand Club & Spa Resort is the perfect break from the hustle and bustle of Mumbai. Perfectly positioned in Thane, within an hour's drive of the city's Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, this resort oasis makes for an ideal escape for Mumbai residents.

Offering unrivalled hospitality and the perfect balance of seclusion, peace and recreation, Saya Grand Club & Spa Resort is a luxurious staycation option. Discover contemporary accommodation, multiple dining options and even a virtual reality gaming area. Whether you want to relax in the swimming pool, indulge in some spa treatments, or entertain the kids at the outdoor gaming area, there is something for everyone to enjoy. Looking for a break from Mumbai without leaving the city? This is the resort for you.
offer_address: 606, Mumbai - Nashik Expy, Anjur, Amane, Maharashtra 421302

title: Club Lounge Luxury in the Heart of Mumbai
description: Experience the height of Mumbai glamour at one of the finest five-star hotels in the country and one of the top ten hotels in the city. Enjoy a two-night weekend stay at ITC Grand Central Mumbai with daily buffet breakfasts, Point of View lounge access including nightly cocktails and canapés, dining and spa discounts and more.
offer_address: 287, Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Road, Parel, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400012, India

title: Mumbai Seafront Escape on Juhu Beach with Five Restaurants, Pool & Spa
description:
Discover the perfect blend of beachside bliss and city sophistication at this contemporary haven overlooking Mumbai's Juhu Beach. Take a refreshing dip in the inviting outdoor pool, rejuvenate with luxurious spa treatments or keep up with your routine at the fully equipped fitness centre.

Savour a variety of global flavours at one of five dining venues, including a beachfront restaurant perfect for sunset dinners. When you're ready to explore, the bustling Juhu Beach promenade, ISKCON Temple and Prithvi Theatre are all just moments away. Venture further to marvel at the ancient rock-cut temples of Elephanta Island, a short ferry ride away.
offer_address: Balraj Sahni Road, Juhu, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400049, India

title: Oceanfront Oberoi Mumbai Excellence on Nariman Point with Nightly Cocktail, Six Onsite Eateries & Indulgent Wellness Centre
description: Soaring above Marine Drive and the Queen's Necklace, lapped up by stunning Arabian Sea vistas, this esteemed Oberoi escape is the epitome of luxury and grandeur. With sumptuous and spacious rooms, an impressive day spa and fitness centre and sunny rooftop pool, the perfect city break awaits. For those who love to wine and dine, indulge in modern Indian at Ziya, savour Vetro's Italian flavours and sip a nightly complimentary cocktail at The Eau Bar while enjoying the ocean sunset.

title: Mumbai Convenient Airport Stay with Onsite Dining, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Touch down at Novotel Mumbai International Airport, your convenient retreat just a hop from the runway. Crash in style at one of the stylish rooms and suites while the buzz of Mumbai plays outside. If you're feeling hungry, dive into global flavours at Food Exchange or kick back with a speakeasy-style cocktail at 190 AMSL.

Strategically sandwiched between Mumbai's Western and Eastern Express Highways, this is your gateway to the city's heartbeat. Zip to business hotspots like MIDC, SEEPZ or Bandra Kurla Complex, then slide back to your cocoon for some down time. With a prime location and unbeatable connections, you're plugged into Mumbai, India and beyond.
offer_address: CTS 1359 Marol, Next to Airport Metro Station, Entrance no 3, Andheri Kurla Road, Mumbai 400059, India

title: Contemporary Indian City Break near Mumbai Airport with Six Restaurants & Bars, Swimming Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the pinnacle of comfort at Grand Hyatt Mumbai Hotel & Residences. Nestled in the vibrant Santacruz district, this urban resort boasts spacious apartments, rooms and suites with city and garden views. Dive into the outdoor pool and recharge at the poolside bar, treat yourself at Club Oasis Spa or savour culinary masterpieces across six restaurants and bars.

Just minutes from the airport and the Bandra Kurla Complex, this hotel puts Mumbai at your fingertips. After days exploring nearby temples or shopping at upscale malls, return to the hotel and relax amid 12 acres of lush greenery.
offer_address: Bandra Kurla Complex Vicinity, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400055, India

title: Mumbai Art Deco Glamour with Rooftop Bar & Pool
description: Mumbai's UNESCO World Heritage-listed Art Deco precinct is yours to discover when you stay at InterContinental Marine Drive-Mumbai, an IHG Hotel. Wining and dining is a celebration here: discover romance at the rooftop Dome  bar where views of the Arabian Sea are savoured alongside cocktails and premium wines, or dine at Kebab Korner for authentic and exquisite Indian cuisine. When you need a break from the heat, make a splash in the rooftop pool or dig into comfort food at L&S Bistro.
location_description: InterContinental Marine Drive-Mumbai, an IHG Hotel

title: Resort Style Five-Star Airport Stay Only 15 Minutes from Mumbai
description: Boasting five-star elegance and a spectacular location, The Leela Mumbai is the city oasis you've been searching for. Discover all the facilities you need for a business or leisure stay, just a 15-minute jaunt from Mumbai's iconic sites. Within the sprawling hotel, you will find a long list of stunning amenities, including exquisite onsite eateries, a mesmerising lotus-filled fountain, landscaped gardens with waterfalls and a shimmering swimming pool.
offer_address: Sahar Airport Road, Near Mumbai International Airport, Andheri, Mumbai 400 059, India

title: Waterfront Mumbai Retreat in Upscale Business District with Soothing Spa & Three Restaurants
description: Experience the epitome of Mumbai's elegance paired with breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea at this stylish urban retreat. The hotel's strategic location in the city's thriving business district places you within reach of cultural hotspots, including the National Centre for Performing Arts and the historic Gateway of India. After busy city days, take a dip in the outdoor pool or indulge at one of the hotel's three restaurants - try Frangipani for Indian, Mediterreanean and Italian classics, or India Jones, for authentic Asian recipes.
offer_address: CR 2 Nariman Point, Marine Dr, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400021, India

title: Sophisticated City Escape in the Heart of Mumbai with Four Onsite Restaurants, Outdoor Pool & Day Spa
description: Feel the pulse of the 'City of Dreams' in the most luxurious way possible with a stay at this urban sanctuary in the heart of Mumbai's financial district. Relax in the comfort of well-appointed rooms with ceiling-to-floor windows, enjoy a swim in the outdoor pool or indulge in a pamper session at Trident Spa. For culinary enthusiasts, a range of dining options awaits, including Italian favourites at Botticino and authentic Indian cuisine at Maya.
offer_address: C 56, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400098, India

title: Stylish Central Mumbai Retreat near Airport with Rooftop Pool
description: Uncover the endless heritage and boundless charm of vibrant Mumbai from your base at Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport, an IHG hotel. With easy access to the airport terminals, waste no time setting off on your adventures. After busy days, stay in and dine at the multi-cuisine restaurant or re-energise with a caffeine hit at the 24-hour cafe. Watch the planes take off and admire the misty skyline from the rooftop pool, or treat yourself to a massage at Tattva spa.
location_description: Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Sakinaka Junction, Andheri Kurla Road, Andheri East Mumbai, Maharashtra 400072, India
